name: GameDeals
0:
”Alexa, ask Game Deals for recent deals”
”Alexa, ask Game Deals for ten recent deals”
”Alexa, ask Game Deals todays deals”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: game deals
des: This skill gives Alexa the ability to find out the latest video game deals online and tells you what there are, what store they are in, their percentage off, how their final price. Great skill for frugal gamers! This skill is not affiliated with, but uses data from https://www.isthereanydeal.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
